scripts.predev:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.writeFileSync('src/version.ts','export const VERSION_NAME="dev"
export const VERSION_CODE=0
export const COMMIT_HASH="local"
')"
scripts.prebuild:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('src/version.ts'))fs.writeFileSync('src/version.ts','export const VERSION_NAME="dev"
export const VERSION_CODE=0
export const COMMIT_HASH="local"
')"
